OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Microsoft Windows XP for Embedded Systems
Finding (Description): The remote version of Microsoft Windows has no service pack or the one installed is no longer supported.  As a result, it is likely to contain security vulnerabilities.
Scan Details:
'The remote Windows 5.1 system has Service Pack 2 applied.
The system should have Service Pack 3 installed.

Finding (Description): The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a 'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for 'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an arbitrary remote host.
Remedy:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider changing the default 'public' community string.
Scan Details:
'Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Request size  (bytes) : 42
  Response size (bytes) : 1898
